dct_description_sm: "(2001)." Includes nineteen ancillary maps showing areas at the scale of 1:1,500,000 with important mineral deposits and mines. Library is missing sheet 2 and 3.
dct_creator_sm: Commission for the Geological Map of the World. Sub-commission for the Metallogenic Map of the World
dct_publisher_sm: [Paris, France] : Commission for the Geological Map of the World ; Pretoria, South Africa : Council for Geoscience, ©2002.
